Articles.Content:
I am using one of Cupcakes Ion Drop Ships with an external command seat and an added probecore to activate Kerbnet for some anomaly hunting. The problem is I can only plant one flag before I have to dock with the mothership in orbit. I play sandbox and don't care about messing up the tech tree or contracts. How can I overcome this obstacle? 

++++++++++++++++++++++++

Edit: I think I found a fix on my own. I have not tested extensively but seems to work. This changes the number of flags a Kerbal has upon EVA to 10. I'll run out of fuel before using them all.

 @PART[kerbalEVA]
{
    @MODULE[KerbalEVA]
    {
        @_flags = 10
}

Edited December 6, 2016 by Red Shirt
